trans-unit.source: Represents a ClickOnce deployment manifest.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"></xref>.
A token that represents a version of the .NET Framework runtime.
Gets the versions of the .NET Framework that an application can run on.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.CompatibleFrameworkCollection"></xref> class that represents the versions of the .NET Framework that an application can run on.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to create a desktop shortcut.
"true" or "false".
A string that contains a value that indicates whether to create a desktop shortcut.
Gets or sets the update location for the application.
If this property is not specified, no update location will be defined for the application.
However, if application updates are specified, the update location must be specified.
The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.
A string that indicates the update location for the application.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should be blocked from being started by means of a URL.
If this option is `true`, the application can only be started from the user's **Start** menu.
The default is `false`.
This option is ignored if <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A> is `false`.
`true` if the application is blocked from being started by means of a URL otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a deployment reference that is the entry point of the application.
An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference"></xref> object that represents the entry point of the application.
Gets or sets the URL of the error report.
A string that contains the URL of the error report.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.
If this property is set to `true`, the application will be installed on the user's **Start** menu, and it can be removed by using **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.
The default is `true`.
If this property is set to `false`, the application is intended for online use from a Web page and is available online only.

For WPF Web Browser Applications, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest.HostInBrowser%2A> property to `true`, and you must also set <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A> to `false`.
If this condition is not met, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e).
`true` if the application is an installed application; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether .deploy file extension mapping is used.
If this property is set to `true`, every program file is published with a .deploy file extension.
This setting is useful for Web server security to limit the number of file extensions that have to be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment.
The default is `false`.
`true` if .deploy file extension mapping is used; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the minimum required version number for an application.
If the user's computer has a version of the application that is lower than the minimum required version specified by this property, the user will not have the option to skip the update.
The default is to have no minimum required version.
This input applies only when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A> is set to `true`.
A string indicating the minimum required version number for an application.
Gets or sets the name of the application.
If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest.
This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.
A string that indicates the name of the application.
Gets or sets the publisher of the application.
If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the registered user or from the identity of the generated manifest.
This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.
A string that indicates the publisher of the application.
Gets or sets the suite name that is defined in the manifest.
A string that contains the suite name.
Gets or sets the link that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel for the application.
The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.
A string that indicates the support URL.
Gets or sets a token that represents a version of the .NET Framework runtime.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents a version of the .NET Framework runtime.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether URL query-string parameters are available to the application.
If this property is set to `true`, URL query-string parameters are available to the application.
The default is `false`, specifying that parameters will not be available to the application.
`true` if URL query-string parameters are available to the application; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is updatable.
If this property is set to `true`, the application is updatable.
The default is `false`.
This input applies only when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A> is set to `true`.
`true` if the application is updatable; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the update interval for the application.
The default is zero.

This input only applies only when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> are both set to `true`.
An integer that indicates the update interval for the application.
Gets or sets an object indicating whether updates should be checked in the foreground before the application is started, or in the background while the application is running.
If this property is set to `Foreground`, updates are checked in the foreground.
The default is `Background`.
For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.UpdateMode>.

This input only applies only when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> are both set to `true`.

An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.UpdateMode"></xref> object that indicates whether updates should be checked before the application is started, or while the application is running.
Gets or sets the units used for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateInterval"></xref> property.
The following values are available for the units used for the update interval: `Days`, `Hours`, and `Weeks`.
For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.UpdateUnit>.

This input only applies only when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> are both set to `true`.

An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.UpdateUnit"></xref> object that indicates the units used for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateInterval"></xref> property.
Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.
Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the array of XML elements that represent the versions of the .NET Framework that an application can run on.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.CompatibleFramework"></xref> class that represents the versions of the .NET Framework than an application can run on.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.CreateDesktopShortcut"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.CreateDesktopShortcut"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.DeploymentUrl"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.DeploymentUrl"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.DisallowUrlActivation"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.DisallowUrlActivation"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.ErrorReportUrl"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.ErrorReportUrl"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Install"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.MapFileExtensions"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.MapFileExtensions"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.MinimumRequiredVersion"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.MinimumRequiredVersion"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Product"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Product"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Publisher"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.Publisher"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.SuiteName"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.SuiteName"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.SupportUrl"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.SupportUrl"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.TrustUrlParameters"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.TrustUrlParameters"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateEnabled"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateEnabled"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateInterval"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateInterval"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateMode"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateMode"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateUnit"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest.UpdateUnit"></xref> property.
